example.eg: The convention in this area is to marry young.
According to convention, ham and black-eyed peas are eaten in the American south on New Year's Day.
example.egtrans: 按照美国南部习俗，元旦那天要吃火腿和黑眼豆。

example.eg: The nations drafted a convention to settle the dispute.
example.egtrans: 为解决争端，各国起草了一份公约。

example.eg: The convention for the Republican party attracted thousands of supporters.
example.egtrans: 共和党会议引来了数以千计的支持者。

dsense.name: convention
dsense.guideword: (gathering of people) (某一政党或组织的)

example.eg: Many people arrived at the science fiction convention in costume.

dsense.name: convention center (US), conference centre, convention centre (UK)

example.eg: Social conventions vary from country to country.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 展厅, 大会堂, 会议厅, 社会传统, 社会习俗
